page.title: 09CHRISTIANITY, NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: The principal religious belief in Newton Mearns is Christianity. The Church of Scotland has four places of worship with a total membership of 3771. The Maple Evangelical Church has about 45 members while the Baptist Church has a membership of 240. There is one Roman Catholic Church with a membership of 1680. As is common in this country today, the numbers of adherants to the faith is somewhat falling, although those remaining are just as strong in their beliefs as in past years. One of the problems the Churches face lies in gaining young members who will remain with them for life.
